Text:
The second edition of this book will be published end of this month, if I'm not mistaken.

Perhaps you also have 
"Data Mining: Practical Machine Learning Tools and Techniques, 3rd edition" by Witten et al, and "Introduction to Data Mining" by Pang-Ning et al?

I have this one which I can post if you want:
"Data Mining: Practical Machine Learning Tools and Techniques, Third Edition " by Ian H. Witten, Eibe Frank, Mark A. Hall.
M.rgan K.fmann | 2011 | ISBN: 0123748569 | 664 pages
